Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style, possibly patterned, pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; top of rim glazed; exterior, slip partly worn: at rim, single line with superimposed dots; reserved below; very worn inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0910) (phase 2)
